body_html:
@peterjc123 Thanks! - that solved the compilation (I just copied them into the torch/lib-folder - it would be nice if they were included in the conda package somehow).
Now I am getting link-errors with, though. I think its just because torch.utils.ffi.create_extension has not been modified to support windows yet.
body_text:
@peterjc123 Thanks! - that solved the compilation (I just copied them into the torch/lib-folder - it would be nice if they were included in the conda package somehow).
Now I am getting link-errors with, though. I think its just because torch.utils.ffi.create_extension has not been modified to support windows yet.
body:
@peterjc123 Thanks! - that solved the compilation (I just copied them into the torch/lib-folder - it would be nice if they were included in the conda package somehow). 
Now I am getting link-errors with, though. I think its just because `torch.utils.ffi.create_extension` has not been modified to support windows yet.
